subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN2257 is on the way
description_text:
i was checking the tracking of this order on friday and was very happy to find out that was going to be delivered today ( i mean yesterday ) but didn't arrive then i check this morning and delivery was changed to monday 8/11/25    so i was disappointed but ok with that  and just now i check and says   that the package was returned to  sender today at 4:48 pm because incomplete address    bull shit i don't belive this    so what now ?
is there another way to ship this that is not usps    and do i have to wait until u receive this return and then resend to me ?   can i reorder and when u get this return u can refund that ? i don't want to wait a week or so to get this  but i think i'm fuck anyway is saturday night so i don't think there is going to be anything to do until monday   i guess
you know i was thinking it was coming from china so i was expecting to be more than a week to be delivered but when i check tracking and says that was going to be delivered last friday i just got frustrated because didn't happen

so what I'm going to do is order again later or tomorrow so Monday can be send and when u get the returned one u can refund to my card

i was thinking on cancelling this order but the haptic reactors i order they are coming from china and they get here in few days and i hate doing returns so i'm going to give it another try

so just let me know when u get the return and hopefully u have another delivery option and i will order again this pedals

ty
________________________________

conversations.body_text: Hi alvaro dominguez,     We ship strictly according to the address information you provide. We first need to confirm the reason for the delivery failure. Please confirm whether there is any missing address information.  ​

address is fine no missing information so i don't know why there was a delivery failure
i already buy the same pedals with a different shipping service hopping it will arrive this week and when u get the one returned u can refund to the credit card use to buy   ty
i don't understand why they say missing information when they didn't even try to deliver
on the tracking information it never got to the "out for delivery" step on the tracking timeline
it was departure from facility then received on other facility and was getting prepared to be delivered and the next step was "out for delivery" and delivered    which never happened

so why they say missing information when they didn't even attempt to deliver ?

also on the same tracking information first says estimated delivery fryday 8/8/25  9:00 pm
when it didn't arrive and check again says  updated estimted delivery monday 8/11/25  8:00 pm and finally i check again on saturday hopping to see "out for delivery"  instead was that message that it was been send back because missing information

anyway sorry for all this i'm little frustrated not with u but with usps

Alvaro Dominguez
12320 Washington pl apt D
Los Angeles, CA         90066

this is my address and is what i use to order this

thank you





________________________________

i just receive the pedals so i have to cancel the other order
________________________________
Hi alvaro dominguez,    Okay, I'm glad to hear that good news. We have kept your other order on hold, so please don't worry. We will cancel your other order.
